definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Residents fled smack into the plume of air carrying radioactive debris.
sentences.chinese: 他們直接逃進了空氣中充斥着核碎片的地區。

sentences.english: Bite valve cover protects from dirt and debris, includes a bite valve inside.
sentences.chinese: 咬合閥蓋保護閥遠離灰塵和碎片，包括內置咬氣門芯。

sentences.english: Others are merely accumulations of coral and skeletal debris.
sentences.chinese: 另一些則僅僅是珊瑚和骸骨碎片的堆積。

sentences.english: It was discovered dashed into pieces in his gar-den.
sentences.chinese: 後來他在自己的花園裏發現了被摔成碎片的石膏像。

sentences.english: Wanying smoothed the fragments patiently and reordered them together. Then she attentively read the letter twice.
sentences.chinese: 宛英耐心撫平團皺的碎片，一一拼上，仔細讀了兩遍。

sentences.english: Gusseted tongue keeps debris in its natural habitat.
sentences.chinese: 插角舌頭保持在其自然棲息地的碎片。

sentences.english: In this paper, the scenarios for the future development of spacedebris and collision probabilities are derived.
sentences.chinese: 文內推演了空間碎片未來發展的情況和碰撞概率。

sentences.english: People ran wildly as pieces of glass and bricks fell down.
sentences.chinese: 當玻璃碎片和磚塊落下來時，人們荒亂地跑着。

sentences.english: Are these indications of a fragment of the Tunguska body?
sentences.chinese: 這些現象是否代表那裏埋著通古斯卡撞擊天體的碎片？

sentences.english: Minute fragments from cells of bone marrow.
sentences.chinese: 從骨髓細胞斷裂的微小碎片。

sentences.english: Why did you tear up that paper? Now you have to pick up all thepieces off the floor.
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼要撕紙？現在把地板上的所有碎片撿起來。

sentences.english: When machines get too fragmented, they suffer serious performance degradation.
sentences.chinese: 一旦機器過度碎片化機會遭受嚴重的性能下降。

sentences.english: A wireline bailer that is used to remove sand and debris from the bottom of a well.
sentences.chinese: 從井底去除砂子和碎片所用的由鋼絲繩起下的撈砂筒。

sentences.english: Some word historians say that nitty-gritty refers to the debris – or remains -- left on the floor of slave ships.
sentences.chinese: 一些單詞歷史學家說這個詞指的是販奴船上的碎片。

sentences.english: Extents added while the defragmenter is running will not be eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 在碎片整理程序運行時增加的區段將不會被清除。

sentences.english: The flag was ribboned by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 旗子被風吹成條條碎片。

definition: to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
